thread.title: Oxfam says Haiti director admitted using prostitutes

title: Oxfam says Haiti director admitted using prostitutes
text:
Oxfam says Haiti director admitted using prostitutes Monday, February 19, 2018 - 01:23 
Oxfam releases an internal investigation into allegations of sexual misconduct, in which it says former Haiti country director Roland Van Hauwermeiren admitted using prostitutes at his residence during a relief mission. David Doyle reports.   
Oxfam releases an internal investigation into allegations of sexual misconduct, in which it says former Haiti country director Roland Van Hauwermeiren admitted using prostitutes at his residence during a relief mission. David Doyle reports.  //reut.rs/2sGzQtM
